alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 20 at 6:39PM MST until January 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby, and Highway 56 Bull Lake Road. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of freezing rain will cause icy conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
